title: IBM Cloud Juniper vSRX

section_highlights.title: What is computer networking?
section_highlights.description: Networking, or computer networking, is the process of connecting two or more computing devices, such as desktop computers, mobile devices, routers or applications, to enable the transmission and exchange of information and resources.
